ProgramTimer.MainDesc: This elements controls the Timer shown in in the upper right corner of the HMI Window. The timer can be started, stopped, halted and resumed.
ProgramTimer.Name: Name of the element
ProgramTimer.Time: This attribute holds the time in seconds since the timer has been started
ProgramTimer.Mode: This attribute defines what action the element invokes in the HMI program timer. Mode="Start" will reset the timer and start it. If it is not visible it will appear after this command.
